items.sentence: Tom can\'t stop Mary from saying what she thinks.
Is there anywhere I can go to find a flea market?
It was hard for him to live on his small pension.
At the moment, there isn\'t anyone in the office.
Mary had a ring on every finger of her left hand.
My grandmother is always complaining of the cold.
Nothing out of the ordinary happened on our trip.
Some children were playing frisbee near the pond.
Tom didn\'t quite understand what was being said.
Tom didn\'t say how he was planning to get there.
Tom didn\'t say how many times he had been there.
You\'re going to be late for school, aren\'t you?
You\'re going to get hurt if you\'re not careful.
Have you done everything you were supposed to do?
Have you ever asked Tom why he enjoys doing that?
Have you ever been the victim of a violent crime?
Have you ever been treated for a mental disorder?
Have you ever crossed a river as big as this one?
I want to get back to Boston as soon as possible.
I want to learn how to say a few words in French.
I want to see you in your office in half an hour.
I want to thank all of you for coming here today.
I want to thank you for helping us get that done.
Tom\'s great-grandfather was the mayor of Boston.
Tom\'s hair has turned gray since I last saw him.
Tom\'s house is only three blocks away from here.
Tom\'s new girlfriend is much younger than he is.
Tom had his wallet stolen while he was in Boston.
Tom hardly spoke any French when I first met him.
Tom has a history of arrests for drunken driving.
Tom has already told Mary not to do that anymore.
Tom has written many magazine articles on whales.
Tom is going out with a Chinese exchange student.
I\'m looking for somebody who understands French.
I\'m not convinced that Tom is telling the truth.
I\'m not expecting anyone to show up before 2:30.
I\'m not going to do that the way Tom told me to.
Tom translated the book from French into English.
Tom treated himself to a large dish of ice cream.
Tom tried to get Mary to do his homework for him.
Tom told me that he was planning to study abroad.
Tom usually wears blue slippers around the house.
Tom was a pretty good singer when he was younger.
Tom was standing in front of the guest room door.
Why can\'t we just tell Tom that we can\'t do it?
A lot has changed around here since you\'ve left.
Tom wanted to know why Mary didn\'t want to come.
No one knows how many people died in that battle.
No one seems to have the guts to do that anymore.
Nobody can stop us from doing what we want to do.
